for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    x11, y11, x12, y12 = map(int, raw_input().split())
    x21, y21, x22, y22 = map(int, raw_input().split())
    a1 = (x12 - x11) * (y12 - y11)
    a2 = (x22 - x21) * (y22 - y21)
    xi1 = max(x11, x21)
    yi1 = max(y11, y21)
    xi2 = min(x12, x22)
    yi2 = min(y12, y22)
    w = (xi2 - xi1)
    h = (yi2 - yi1)
    intersection = w * h
    valid_intersection = w > 0 and h > 0
    if valid_intersection:
        print a1 + a2 - intersection
    else:
        print a1 + a2
